issue.title: [CI] Set -DARROW_VERBOSE_THIRDPARTY_BUILD=OFF in builds running in Travis CI, maybe all docker-compose builds by default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5906](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5906). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This setting should be disabled in general unless we are trying to debug something. It makes logs much more verbose
